Frédéric Chopin

Variations on a German national air, KK IVa/4

1826 · Chomiński 227 · Brown 14

[IMSLP]

The theme, the song Der Schweizerbub, is preceded by an introduction and followed by four variations and a Tempo di valse.

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 318 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ernst Herttrich
  • Henle · HN 319 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ernst Herttrich
  • National Edition · 28 (B IV) · Various Works (B) · ed. Jan Ekier

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 3.5
